text: Gastone Calabresi (6 April 1886 - 19 June 1916) was an Italian gymnast. He competed in the men's team event at the 1908 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1886 births Category:1916 deaths Category:Italian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Italy Category:Gymnasts at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:People from Ferrara
title: Gastone Calabresi
